t484.text: Yes, but who we'd get in his place is pretty scary. Dutton (who is probably sitting In parliament illegally) or Porter, a nasty piece of work all round.

t489.text: I hav been incredibly grateful to be able to live in this beautiful country. Witnessing a huge part of the country burn, people losing their lives and wildlife perishing is giving me survivor’s guilt. I am on a solo trip to Launceston and everything feels so grim. Heartbreaking.https://twitter.com/waterpenny10/status/1213247368440627200 …
